metadata.name: Chopper Webshell Process Pattern
metadata.comment: Detects patterns found in process executions cause by China Chopper like tiny (ASPX) webshells

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\w3wp.exe')) AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\w3wp.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('&ipconfig&echo')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('&quser&echo')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('&whoami&echo')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('&c:&echo')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('&cd&echo')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('&dir&echo')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('&echo [e]')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('&echo [s]'))))

output.summary: Detects patterns found in process executions cause by China Chopper like tiny (ASPX) webshells
